ygData.msgSnippet: Hey guys, At what weight will monks start losing AC and can any monks share some xperience on how to ean money w/o carrying much loot?And If i wear full
ygData.messageBody:
Hey guys,

At what weight will monks start losing AC and can any monks share some xperience on how to ean money w/o carrying much loot?And If i wear full patchwork,will it go up to the AC drop limit?

Thx in Advance!

Entreri wrote:

Any donations to my lv1 chr is WARMLY WELCOMED!! :PPP Artemis Entreri"Do you have any last words?"
